attributes.action: Explain, given the evidence why the continuation of the Firearms Act is needed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Me, and others like me would like to know why we have been stripped of the right that was given to us in 1689 to bear arms, given that since the outright ban came into force in 1997, violent crime has risen to a higher level than in any other industrial country, and that this is reflected in other countries and states where gun control has come into force, please explain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
